the air in New Orleans

The Boston Cello Quartet, all members of the Boston Symphony Orchestra, are celebrating the release of its first CD, "Pictures."

North Korea threatens US over rocket launches

North Korea is threatening to retaliate for what it calls US double standards over recent rocket launches by Pyongyang and US ally Seoul. A spokesman did not say what that might entail.

Business

Dow closes over 14,000 for first time since Oct. 2007

Propelled by strong auto sales and optimism about U.S. jobs, the Dow Jones industrial average crossed the line early Friday and continued flirting with the mark all day. The other major stock indexes also rose.
